title.narrative: UN Women Access to Justice Project
UN Women Access to Justice Project

description.narrative:
The overall objective of the project is to strengthen implementation of the Law No. 6284 to Protect Family and Prevent Violence against Women and to improve the response of the justice system to violence against women, in line with international norms, standards, and legal framework, to which Turkey is a party. The project is structured around 1 Outcome and 2 Outputs.
Outcome 1: The justice system more effectively implements Law No. 6284 and relevant regulations in order to deal with cases of violence against women, in line with the relevant international legal framework.
Output 1: Capacity of judges of the Family Courts and prosecutors of the Offices of Domestic Violence and Violence Against Women to effectively apply Law No. 6284 is strengthened and is consistent with the international legal framework including CEDAW.
Output 2: Tools are developed to improve the performance of Legal Support and Victim Services Directorates and the accessibility of their services by women.

Att stärka genomförandet av den nationella lagen nr 6284 för att skydda familjen och förebygga våld mot kvinnor och att förbättra rättssystemets reaktion på våld mot kvinnor, i linje med internationella normer, standarder och rättsliga ramar, som Turkiet är en part i .

To strengthen implementation of the National Law No. 6284 to Protect Family and Prevent Violence against Women and to improve the response of the justice system to violence against women, in line with international norms, standards, and legal framework, to which Turkey is a party.

participating-org.narrative: UNWOMEN/United Nations Entity for Gender Equality and the Empowerment of Women
UNWOMEN/United Nations Entity for Gender Equality and the Empowerment of Women

sector.narrative: Women’s rights organisations and movements, and government institutions

tag.narrative: 16.1 - Avsevärt minska alla former av våld och dödligt våld överallt.
16.1 - Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere.
16.3 - Främja rättssäkerheten på nationell och internationell nivå samt säkerställa lika tillgång till rättvisa för alla.
16.3 - Promote the rule of law at the national and international levels and ensure equal access to justice for all.
5.1 - Avskaffa alla former av diskriminering av alla kvinnor och flickor överallt
5.1 - End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere.
5.2 - Avskaffa alla former av våld mot alla kvinnor och flickor i det offentliga och privata rummet, inklusive människohandel, sexuellt utnyttjande och andra typer av exploatering.
5.2 - Eliminate all forms of violence against all women and girls in the public and private spheres, including trafficking and sexual and other types of exploitation.
5.3 - Avskaffa alla skadliga sedvänjor, såsom barnäktenskap, tidiga äktenskap och tvångsäktenskap samt kvinnlig könsstympning.
5.3 - Eliminate all harmful practices, such as child, early and forced marriage and female genital mutilation.
